column1: obituary for: william c. wahl | garnett-new-mc. donald funeral home| william c. wahl
column3: passed away june 12 2015 at his home. he was born in covington the son of the late fred and henrietta stevens wahl. he was also preceded by a brother thomas keyes. bill was a truck driver for many years and was a vietnam veteran having served in the navy. surviving are his wife
column7: amy and christina balsiger and catherine wahl. five grandchildren
column11: cali and peyton also survive. visitation will be on wednesday june 17 2015 from 5 to 7 pm with a memorial service at 7 pm at garnett-new-mc. donald funeral home in warsaw.
